com.robopupu.api.dependency

Class DependencyScope

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.robopupu.api.dependency.DependencyScope
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AppDependencyScope

    public abstract class DependencyScope
extends java.lang.Object
    DependencyScope provides an abstract base class for implementing objects that provide and cache a scoped dependencies. An instance of a concrete implementation of DependencyScope is not used directly to access dependencies, but via the static methods of class Dependency (or convenience class D).

    • Method Detail

      • getDependencyProvider

        protected DependencyProvider getDependencyProvider()
        Gets the DependencyProvider. A DependencyProvider is either code generated by the annotation processor of Fuusio API Compiler or explicitly created by method createDependencyProvider().
        Returns:
        A DependencyProvider. May return null.

      • getId

        public java.lang.String getId()
        Gets the identifier of this DependencyScope. The default identifier is the canonical class name of the DependencyScope.
        Returns:
        The identifier as a String.

      • getOwner

        public final DependencyScopeOwner getOwner()
        Get the DependencyScopeOwner that manages the lifecycle this DependencyScope.
        Returns:
        A DependencyScopeOwner.

      • setOwner

        public void setOwner(DependencyScopeOwner owner)
        Set the DependencyScopeOwner that manages the lifecycle this DependencyScope.
        Parameters:
        owner - A DependencyScopeOwner.

      • getParentScope

        public final DependencyScope getParentScope()
        Gets the parent DependencyScope.
        Returns:
        A DependencyScope. May return null if the parent is not set.

      • setParentScope

        public void setParentScope(DependencyScope parent)
        Sets the parent DependencyScope.
        Parameters:
        parent - A DependencyScope. May be null.

      • getMockedScope

        public final DependencyScope getMockedScope()
        Gets the DependencyScope that overrides this DependencyScope. An overriding DependencyScope can be used for providing mock dependencies for unit tests.
        Returns:
        A DependencyScope. May return null.

      • setMockedScope

        public void setMockedScope(DependencyScope scope)
        Sets the given DependencyScope to override this DependencyScope. An overriding DependencyScope can be used for providing mock dependencies for unit tests.
        Parameters:
        scope - A DependencyScope.

      • isDisposable

        public boolean isDisposable()
        Tests if this DependencyScope can be disposed.
        Returns:
        A boolean value.

        Parameters:
        dependant - An Object.

        Tests if the specified type represents the requested dependency type.
        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • dependency

        protected final <T> T dependency(java.lang.Object dependency)
        Caches the requested dependency Object before it is returned to a requester.
        Type Parameters:
        T - The generic return type of the cached dependency.
        Parameters:
        dependency - The requested dependency Object to be cached.
        Returns:
        The cached dependency Object.

      • cache

        protected <T> T cache(java.lang.Class<T> dependencyType,
                      java.lang.Object dependency)
        Caches the given requested dependency Object using the requested type as a key.
        Type Parameters:
        T - The generic return type of the cached dependency.
        Parameters:
        dependencyType - The dependence type as a Class used as a key.
        dependency - The requested dependency Object to be cached.
        Returns:
        The cached dependency Object.

      • getDependency

        protected <T> T getDependency()
        This method is meant to be implemented by each concrete implementation of DependencyScope. The requested dependency instance is returned by the implementation, if it is capable of providing a such instance. The implementation of this method should not delegate the request to any other DependencyScope. If the implementation is not able to cache the requested instance, the design contract is to return null instead.
        Type Parameters:
        T - A type parameter for casting the requested instance to expected type.
        Returns:
        The requested dependency instance if is this DependencyScope implementation is capable of providing such instance otherwise null. This default implementation returns null.

      • getDependency

        protected <T> T getDependency(java.lang.Class<T> dependencyType,
                              java.lang.Object dependant,
                              boolean createNew)
        Gets an dependency instance of the specified type. The requested dependency is first searched from the currently active DependencyScope. If a requested instance is not found the search is delegated to parent DependencyScope. As a last attempt, the AppDependencyScope is searched.
        Type Parameters:
        T - A type parameter for casting the requested instance to expected type.
        Parameters:
        dependencyType - A Class specifying the type of the requested instance.
        dependant - The requesting object. This parameter is required when the requesting dependant is also a requested within the object graph represented by a DependencyScope.
        createNew - A boolean parameter specifying if an instance of the requested type should be created using reflection if an instance does not exists already.
        Returns:
        The returned instance. If null is returned it indicates an error in the implementation of the DependencyScope.

      • getDependencies

        protected <T> void getDependencies(DependencyQuery<T> query,
                                   java.lang.Object dependant)
        Gets an dependency instance of the specified type. The requested dependency is first searched from the currently active DependencyScope. If a requested instance is not found the search is delegated to parent DependencyScope. As a last attempt, the AppDependencyScope is searched.
        Type Parameters:
        T - A type parameter for casting the requested instance to expected type.
        Parameters:
        query - A DependencyQuery that defines the context for finding dependencies and a container for storing the found dependencies.
        dependant - The requesting object. This parameter is required when the requesting dependant is also a requested within the object graph represented by a DependencyScope.

      • dispose

        protected void dispose()
        Disposes this DependencyScope to support effective GC and to avoid memory leaks.

      • isAppScope

        public boolean isAppScope()
        Tests if this DependencyScope is a application scoped DependencyScope.
        Returns:
        A boolean,

      • onActivated

        public void onActivated(DependencyScopeOwner owner)
        This method is invoked by Dependency when this DependencyScope is activated for the given DependencyScopeOwner.
        Parameters:
        owner - A DependencyScopeOwner.

      • onDeactivated

        public void onDeactivated(DependencyScopeOwner owner)
        This method is invoked by Dependency when this DependencyScope is deactivated for the given DependencyScopeOwner.
        Parameters:
        owner - A DependencyScopeOwner.

      • initialize

        public void initialize()
        Invoked to initialize this DependencyScope.

      • createDependencyProvider

        protected DependencyProvider createDependencyProvider()
        This method can be overridden in extending classes to provide a method that explicitly instantiates a DependencyProvider for this DependencyScope. By default this method returns null. If this method returns a null, then an instance of a DependencyProvider is attempted to instantiate dynamically.
        Returns:
        A DependencyProvider. The default implementation returns null.

      • removeDependency

        public java.util.List<java.lang.Class<?>> removeDependency(java.lang.Object dependency)
        Removes the given dependency from this DependencyScope.
        Parameters:
        dependency - The dependency to be removed as an Object.
        Returns:
        A List of removed dependency types for the given dependency.

      • hasDependency

        public boolean hasDependency(java.lang.Object dependency)
        Tests if given dependency exists in this DependencyScope.
        Parameters:
        dependency - The dependency as an Object.

      • hasDependency

        public boolean hasDependency(java.lang.Class<?> dependencyType)
        Tests if an instance of the specified dependency type exists in this DependencyScope.
        Parameters:
        dependencyType - A Class specifying the dependency type.
